name: INPUT LAG
description:
INPUT LAG is made in Unity by House Bois Games for the 2018 48h GMTK Game Jam. The brief for the jam, "genre without mechanic", forced us to think outside the box and really rethink what a game mechanic can be. We had plenty of whacky ideas before we settled on a direction. INPUT LAG is a game about input lag -- a platformer with no input. Can you complete the levels before they start?

CONTROLS
Splash screen :
any key or left mouse to start
Menu :
W, S, ENTER to navigate
Game : 
W, A, D (1 button at a time) to record input 
ENTER to execute input
